Hi,

You have been identified as a potential user of one or more of our support services.
As part of our Voice of the Business Initiative (VOB), we would like to listen to YOUR voice and YOUR feedback on the Group's support services.


Please use the following link to access the VOB Survey & complete it by June 30th.

Follow this link to the Survey: 
Take the Survey <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/V1CJC1BKACxE194cLfDhVlLmU?domain=chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com> 

Or copy and paste the URL below into your internet browser:
https://chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_51QykToza4Sd9wG?Q_DL=kVQOd41PNMt2tH7_51QykToza4Sd9wG_CGC_DWtUYEnr4kGc9Ah&Q_RD=EMD_AocXSDt1pPAEQL8&Q_CHL=email <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/V1CJC1BKACxE194cLfDhVlLmU?domain=chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com> 

This survey will take you between 5-10min overall depending on number of services you select and will be completely anonymous. Please make sure you read the survey definitions carefully before sharing feedback on specific services.

This survey will take you between 5-10min overall depending on number of services you select and will be completely anonymous. Please make sure you read the survey definitions carefully before sharing feedback on specific services.

This initiative is part of the ambition to create world class operations. Your feedback is valuable and will help our Support Services keep thriving for EXCELLENCE.

Thank you in advance for your time.

Kind Regards,

VOB Team
